options.content:
This dashboard follows the RED method (Rate of traffic, Errors, Duration/latency) to measure RPC from high level perspective.

- The "Network" variable is the data source for the dashboard, and applies to the whole dashboard. 
- The "QPS" variable only applies to the rate breakdown, and the "Latency" variable only applies to the duration breakdown.

For more details, please refer to the drilldown dashboard.
